ModOp.Text: Does not apply to Arctic plateau islands.

Every trade with another faction is amended by a tax of 5t of [ItemAssetData([RefGuid]) GoodGenerationPoolFormatted]. If a customs duty is applied to the island's trading post, the effect applies to all the island's piers as well.

Every trade with another faction is amended by a tax 5t of [ItemAssetData({ItemGuid}) GoodGenerationPoolFormatted]. If a customs duty is applied to the island's trading post, the effect applies to all the island's piers as well.
The need for [ItemAssetData([RefGuid]) GoodConsumptionAllProvidedNeedsFormatted] is fulfilled by [ItemAssetData([RefGuid]) GoodConsumptionAmountInPercent(0) >> sellShipPrice]%.
Adjusts the amount of free area inside a lumberjack that is needed to reach full productivity.
Residences gain the specified amount of bonus residents from: [ItemAssetData([ToolOneHelper ItemActiveBuff([RefGuid])]) InputBenefitAllAdditionalSupplyFormatted].
Framework Knitters, Fur Dealers and [AssetData(1441259) Text].
Trade routes with this resource will get high priority at this pier.
